.. currentmodule:: tweezepy.smmcalibration

Detailed API documentation
==========================

The main user-facing classes are :class:`AV` and :class:`PSD`..


.. autoclass:: AV
    :members:
.. autoclass:: PSD
    :members:
    
Note that :class:`AV` and :class:`PSD` use the base class :class:`calibration`.

.. autoclass:: calibration
    :members:
